column4: Anybody know how to find the most recently modified files on my filesystem?
im trying to find files that this program is creating, i want to see where these files are being made or modified, thats my end goal
find with options -ctime or -mtime; man find.
there are plenty of web-based man pages, example: http://unixhelp.ed.ac.uk/CGI/man-cgi?find
